teamfighttactics.name: Elise
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Summons 2 / 3 / 4 Spiderlings with 500 health, and transforms into a  melee attacker for 60 seconds, gaining 60 / 90 / 120% life steal.

teamfighttactics.name: Gnar
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Transforms into a  melee attacker for 60 seconds, gaining 300 / 600 / 900 health, 30 / 60 / 90 attack damage, jumping behind the farthest enemy and then  shunts all surrounding enemies 2 hexes toward his team,  stunning them for 2 seconds and dealing 200 / 300 / 400 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Nidalee
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: After a 0.5-second delay, heals herself and the weakest ally over 6 seconds, healing for a total of 150 / 375 / 600 health, then transforms into a  melee attacker for 60 seconds, gaining 20 / 70 / 120 attack damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Shyvana
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Dashes and transforms into a  ranged attacker for 60 seconds, gaining 60 / 110 / 160 attack damage and attack range. When transformed, her attacks set enemies on fire, dealing 250 / 375 / 500 magic damage over 3 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Swain
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Transforms for 6 seconds, dealing 50 / 100 / 150 magic damage to all nearby enemies with each tick while healing for 50 / 90 / 130 health with each tick. At the end of his transformation, sends out a burst of energy dealing 300 / 600 / 900 magic damage to nearby enemies.

teamfighttactics.name: Akali
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Deals 200 / 375 / 550 magic damage to all enemies in a 2-hex cone.

teamfighttactics.name: Evelynn
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Deals 200 / 250 / 300 magic damage to the 3 closest enemies and blinks back 3 hexes. Damage is increased to 600 / 1000 / 1500 against enemies below 50% health.

teamfighttactics.name: Katarina
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Channels for 2.5 seconds and fires daggers at 3 / 5 / 7 nearby enemies, dealing 40 / 60 / 80 magic damage per tick and applying  Grievous Wounds, reducing healing on them for 3 seconds. The channel can deal a total of 600 / 900 / 1200 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: KhaZix
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Deals 150 / 250 / 350 magic damage to the target enemy. Instead deals 400 / 600 / 800 magic damage if they have no allies adjacent to them.

teamfighttactics.name: Pyke
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Dash behind the furthest enemy, creating a 1 second afterimage that then follows to deal 150 / 200 / 250 magic damage and  stun all enemies it passes through for 2.5 / 3 / 3.5 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Rengar
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Leaps at the weakest enemy, dealing 200 / 300 / 400% AD physical damage. After leaping, he gains 30 / 50 / 70% attack speed and 25% critical strike chance for 6 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Zed
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Throw a shuriken in a 4-hex line, dealing 200 / 300 / 400 magic damage to enemies passed.

teamfighttactics.name: Ahri
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Fire an orb in a 5-hex line that then returns, dealing 100 / 175 / 250 magic damage to enemies in each pass.

teamfighttactics.name: AurelionSol
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: After a 0.35-second delay, deals 250 / 450 / 650 magic damage to all enemies in a line.

teamfighttactics.name: Karthus
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Channel for 3 seconds to deal 350 / 600 / 850 magic damage to 4 / 7 / 10 random enemies.

teamfighttactics.name: Kassadin
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: PASSIVE: Basic attacks reduce target's current mana by 20 / 40 / 60, granting a shield for the same amount lasting 4 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Lulu
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Grants 1 / 2 / 3 allies 300 / 475 / 650 bonus health for 6 seconds,  knocking up enemies near them for 1.25 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Morgana
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Fires chains to nearby enemies up to 3 hexes away, dealing 250 / 350 / 450 magic damage, and  slowing them by 20% while the chains hold. After 3 seconds if the chains held, deals the same damage and  stuns them for 2 / 4 / 6 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Veigar
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Deals 300 / 500 / 700 magic damage to the target enemy. If the target is a lower star level than Veigar, the target is executed.

teamfighttactics.name: Ashe
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Fires an arrow that  stuns and deals 200 / 400 / 600 magic damage to the first enemy hit. The stun lasts 1 / 1.5 / 2 seconds per hex traveled.

teamfighttactics.name: Kindred
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Creates a zone around herself for 4 / 5 / 6 seconds that prevents nearby allies from losing health at 300 / 600 / 900 or below.

teamfighttactics.name: Varus
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: After charging for 1.5 seconds, fires an arrow up to 8 hexes away, dealing 400 / 600 / 800 magic damage to all enemies hit.

teamfighttactics.name: Vayne
teamfighttactics.passive_desc:
PASSIVE: Basic attacks apply a Silver Bolts stack. Attacking a new enemy removes all stacks from the previous target.
The third stack consumes them all to deal 8 / 10 / 12% of target's maximum health bonus true damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Darius
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Deals 150 / 200 / 250 magic damage to all nearby enemies and heals himself for 100 / 150 / 200 for each enemy hit.

teamfighttactics.name: Garen
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Spins his sword around his body for 4 seconds, becoming immune to magic damage and dealing 50 / 65 / 80 magic damage to nearby enemies each second. The spins can deal a total of 450 / 585 / 720 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Kayle
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Target the 1 / 2 / 3 weakest allies, making them immune to damage for 2 / 3 / 4 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Mordekaiser
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Slam forward in a 3-hex line, dealing 200 / 325 / 450 magic damage to the two closest enemies within.

teamfighttactics.name: Poppy
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: After charging for 0.75 seconds, swings her hammer at the closest enemy, dealing 300 / 400 / 500 magic damage,  knocking up for 1 second and  stunning for 1.5 / 2.5 / 3.5 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: Sejuani
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Creates a large glacial storm that detonates after 2 seconds, dealing 100 / 175 / 250 magic damage and  stunning for 3 / 4 / 5 seconds enemies within it.

teamfighttactics.name: Gangplank
teamfighttactics.passive_desc:
PASSIVE: Periodically spawns Powder Kegs.
ACTIVE: Detonates all active Powder Kegs, dealing 200 / 325 / 450 magic damage to enemies caught in the blast.

teamfighttactics.name: Graves
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: PASSIVE: Basic attacks deal 5 / 10 / 15% increased physical damage and hit all enemies in a 2-hex cone.

teamfighttactics.name: Lucian
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Dashes away from the target enemy and then attacks twice. The first attack deals physical damage, while the second deals magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: MissFortune
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Channels for 3 seconds and fires 14 waves of bullets in a cone, dealing 57.14 / 89.29 / 121.43 magic damage with each wave. The channel can deal a total of 800 / 1250 / 1700 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Tristana
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Plant a bomb on the target enemy that detonates after 4 seconds or 3 basic attacks, dealing 60 / 90 / 120 magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes. The damage is increased by 50% with each basic attack, dealing up to 150 / 225 / 300 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Braum
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Raises a barrier for 4 seconds that redirects all incoming damage to Braum, and reduces the damage he takes through the shield by 60 / 75 / 90%.

teamfighttactics.name: Leona
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: After a 0.625-second delay, calls down a solar ray that deals 175 / 250 / 325 magic damage and  slows all enemies within a 3x3 for 5 / 8 / 11 seconds. The enemy in the center is instead  stunned for the same duration.

teamfighttactics.name: Anivia
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Channels a large hailstorm for 8 seconds, dealing 87.5 / 118.75 / 150 magic damage each second and slowing the attack speed of enemies inside it by 50 / 70 / 90%. The storm can deal a total of 700 / 950 / 1200 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Brand
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Unleashes a fireball that bounces 4 / 4 / 6 times between enemies, dealing 200 / 300 / 400 magic damage with each bounce.

teamfighttactics.name: Kennen
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Summons a storm around him for 3 seconds, dealing 50 / 80 / 110 magic damage each 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies,  stunning for 1.5 seconds them after 3 hits. The storm can deal a total of 350 / 560 / 770 magic damage.

teamfighttactics.name: Lissandra
teamfighttactics.passive_desc:
ACTIVE: Encases the target in ice,  stunning them for 1.5 seconds and dealing 150 / 200 / 250 magic damage to nearby enemies. She also creates a 2x2 zone for 3 seconds that  slows enemies within for 3 seconds.
If she is below 50% health, she instead encases herself for 2 seconds, becoming untargetable.

teamfighttactics.name: Blitzcrank
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE:  Pulls the farthest enemy into melee range,  stunning them for 2.5 seconds and dealing 100 / 450 / 800 magic damage. Additionally his next basic attack  knocks up the target.

teamfighttactics.name: ChoGath
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: After a 1.5-second delay, deals 200 / 400 / 600 magic damage and  knocks up all enemies in a 3x3 area,  stunning them for 2 / 2.25 / 2.5 seconds.

teamfighttactics.name: RekSai
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Burrows into the ground, becoming untargetable for 1.5 seconds while healing each 0.5 seconds for 300 / 400 / 500 health in total. She then unburrows, dealing 150 / 200 / 250 magic damage and  knocking up for 1.25 seconds the closest enemy.

teamfighttactics.name: Volibear
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: For 20 seconds, gains 8% increased size and empowers his basic attacks to bounce to up to 3 / 4 / 5 enemies 1 hex away, dealing 60 / 80 / 100% AD physical damage to secondary targets, and applying on-hit effects.

teamfighttactics.name: Warwick
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Pounces onto the lowest health enemy,  stunning them for 1.5 seconds, dealing 150 / 225 / 300 magic damage over 3 hits and healing over the duration.

teamfighttactics.name: Aatrox
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Slams forward, dealing 350 / 600 / 850 magic damage to all enemies in a circle.

teamfighttactics.name: Draven
teamfighttactics.passive_desc:
ACTIVE: Draven starts spinning his axe, causing his next basic attack to gain 50 / 100 / 150% bonus on-hit physical damage and 100% attack speed for 5.75 seconds, stacking up to two times.
The spinning axe ricochets off the target high up into the air, landing 2 seconds later at Draven's current position. If Draven catches an axe, Spinning Axe is reapplied for no additional cost on his next basic attack.
Draven can hold up to two Spinning Axes in his hands at once.

teamfighttactics.name: Fiora
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Becomes immune to damage and spells for 1.5 seconds, and then  stuns for 1.5 seconds and deals 100 / 175 / 250 magic damage to the closest enemy.

teamfighttactics.name: Shen
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Creates a zone around himself for 3 / 4 / 5 seconds, allowing allies inside to  dodge all attacks.

teamfighttactics.name: Yasuo
teamfighttactics.passive_desc: ACTIVE: Stab in a 2-hex line, dealing 150 / 250 / 350 magic damage. Every third cast instead launches a tornado in a 6-hex line, dealing the same magic damage and  knocking up enemies for 1.25 seconds.
